name: Can You Handle It?
description:
Welcome to the Liquor Store!

You're the new employee that runs the redemption center, the stinkiest, stickiest, and revolting place known to man. Your job is to oversee the operation of the machines and see to it that things are cleaned up at the end of each day; otherwise, things can get extra hectic.

THIS IS A DEMO CURRENT TO 2/22/2022

This demo has 3 levels so far along with a 2 player mode and some upgrades to make the game more fun!

Currently the game is proven to work with Xbox controllers, no guarantee about other controllers

Controls

Looking : Right Stick

Moving : Left Stick

Action : (X)

Drop : (B)

Pause : Start
